game.engine.stage.scene.object

Class CachedLabelSceneObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.engine.stage.scene.object.SceneObject
      • game.engine.stage.scene.object.LabelSceneObject
        • game.engine.stage.scene.object.CachedLabelSceneObject

  • public class CachedLabelSceneObject
extends LabelSceneObject
    LabelSceneObject that draws the text on a cached BufferedImage. This speeds up drawing when animating text, but the quality might be less.
    Author:
    Marvin Bruns
    See Also:
    LabelSceneObject

      • paint

        protected void paint(java.awt.Graphics2D g,
         long elapsedTime)
        Description copied from class: SceneObject
        Paint this SceneObject. This method maybe called for collision testing with an elapsed time of zero. For correct collision the SceneObject it is important, that the object is drawn in it's actual state.
        Overrides:
        paint in class LabelSceneObject
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics Object for painting
        elapsedTime - Elapsed time since the last call to this method
